In all fairness,

THIS TORRENT IS WORKING FINE

here are the steps that worked for me:
1) after downloading, double click on any of the rar files and unpack with WinRAR

2) with the "scrabble2009.bin" and "scrabble2009.cue" files, mount the cue file using DAEMON tools

3) install the game, configure if you want to launch in windowed mode (this is a great upgrade for me coming from scrabble 2007 version)

it works fine for me and i've started to play it already!
